Package controller

Class MonthlyBudgetController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.MonthlyBudgetController
  • @CrossOrigin
@RestController
@RequestMapping("api/expense-management")
public class MonthlyBudgetController
extends java.lang.Object
    The REST Controller responsible for exposing the endpoints related to managing monthly budgets: - delete-monthly-budget - add-monthly-budget - update-monthly-budget - get-monthly-budgets

    • Method Detail

      • deleteMonthlyBudget

        @DeleteMapping("/delete-monthly-budget/{budgetId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> deleteMonthlyBudget​(@PathVariable
                                                                      int budgetId,
                                                                      @RequestHeader("Authorization")
                                                                      java.lang.String bearerToken)
        Endpoint for deleting a monthly budget Method: DELETE Requires Authorization header
        Parameters:
        budgetId - the id of the monthly budget to delete
        bearerToken - a String containing the authorization token ; represents the Authorization header
        Returns:
        a ServiceEmptyResponse with status=200 in case of success a ServiceEmptyResponse with status=403 in case the budget with the given id is not owned by the user with the given userId a ServiceEmptyResponse with status=500 in case the delete operation fails

      • create

        @PostMapping("add-monthly-budget")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> create​(@RequestBody
                                                         MonthlyBudgetDto monthlyBudgetDto,
                                                         @RequestHeader("Authorization")
                                                         java.lang.String bearerToken)
        Add a monthly budget Method: POST Requires Authorization header
        Parameters:
        monthlyBudgetDto - a MonthlyBudgetDto corresponding to the monthly budget to be added
        bearerToken - a String containing the authorization token ; represents the Authorization header
        Returns:
        the view model of the added monthly budget, if successful

      • updateMonthlyBudget

        @PutMapping("/update-monthly-budget/{budgetId}")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> updateMonthlyBudget​(@PathVariable
                                                                      int budgetId,
                                                                      @RequestBody
                                                                      MonthlyBudgetDto monthlyBudgetDto,
                                                                      @RequestHeader("Authorization")
                                                                      java.lang.String bearerToken)
        Update a monthly budget Method: POST Requires Authorization header
        Parameters:
        budgetId - the id of the monthly budget to be updated
        monthlyBudgetDto - the new data for the monthly budget
        bearerToken - a String containing the authorization token ; represents the Authorization header
        Returns:
        the viewModel of the updated monthly budget

      • getMonthlyBudgets

        @GetMapping("/get-monthly-budgets")
public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> getMonthlyBudgets​(@RequestHeader("Authorization")
                                                                    java.lang.String bearerToken,
                                                                    @RequestParam @DateTimeFormat(pattern="yyyy-MM-dd")
                                                                    java.util.Date startDate,
                                                                    @RequestParam @DateTimeFormat(pattern="yyyy-MM-dd")
                                                                    java.util.Date endDate)
        Get the monthly budgets for a user during a period of time Method: GET Requires Authorization header
        Parameters:
        bearerToken - a String containing the authorization token ; represents the Authorization header4
        startDate - the start of the time interval
        endDate - the end of the time interval
        Returns:
        a collection of view models for the monthly budgets available in the given time interval
